pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tools for Acquiring and Analyzing Political Data // Provides for useful functions to obtain commonly-used data in political analysis and political science, including from sources such as the Comparative Agendas Project https://www.comparativeagendas.net, which provides data on politics and policy from 20+ countries, the MIT Election and Data Science Lab https://www.electionlab.mit.edu, and FiveThirtyEight https://www.FiveThirtyEight.com.
